skills.title: Data Engineering and Pipeline Management
skills.description: Demonstrated expertise in designing and implementing data pipelines and ETL processes with various databases (PostgreSQL, Oracle, MSSQL, Adabas). This skill showcases the ability to handle complex data infrastructure, which is crucial for roles in data science and engineering.

skills.title: Machine Learning and Data Analytics
skills.description: Proven experience in training and implementing machine learning models for classification and prediction, as well as creating dashboards and automating reports. This skill highlights proficiency in applying advanced analytics techniques to derive insights and make data-driven decisions.

skills.title: Programming and Automation
skills.description: Strong proficiency in Python for various purposes including report automation, A/B testing automation, data manipulation, and pipeline failure identification. Additionally, experience with Visual Basic scripting for data preparation. This demonstrates versatility in programming and the ability to streamline processes through automation.

skills.title: Team Leadership and Mentorship
skills.description: Experience in onboarding and mentoring new data engineering team members, as well as building strong customer relationships. This skill emphasizes leadership qualities, ability to work in a team environment, and excellent communication skills, which are valuable in collaborative and client-facing roles.

portfolio.title: ArXiv Scraper with MongoDB Integration
portfolio.description: ArXiv scraper, stored into a NoSQL MongoDB database, ensuring robust and scalable data management.

portfolio.title: Google Maps Scraper
portfolio.description: This script is designed to scrape data from Google Maps using specific keywords, geographic coordinates, and other parameters. It allows users to gather data from Google Maps listings.

portfolio.title: Machine Learning Experiments
portfolio.description: Exploring some Machine Learning Algorithms for image manipulation, creation and reconstruction. Autoencoders, GANs, Cellular Automata.

portfolio.title: Schnocks Digital Atelier
portfolio.description: A set of experiments in algorithmic art, using Kmeans clustering and custom algorithms to convert images into unique art pieces.
